mapper.update: update members set TIER = #{name} where login_id = #{buyer_name}
mapper.insert: insert into TIERPAYMENT (PAY_NUM, LOGIN_ID, PAY_DATE, END_DATE, PAY_PRODUCT, PAY_MONEY, USING_TERM, TIERSTATE) values (#{merchant_uid}, #{buyer_name}, #{payment_time}, DATE_ADD(#{payment_time}, INTERVAL #{using_term} MONTH), #{name}, #{amount}, #{using_term}, 'N')
